Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Dagger = Tool.Handle
local damage = 22
local vCharacter local myTorso local rightShoulder local rightArm
Tool.Enabled = true
local myHumanoid local storeWeld
local r = game:service("RunService") local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local hitSound = Instance.new("Sound") hitSound.Name = "hitSound" hitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" hitSound.Parent = ball hitSound.Volume = 1
local daggers = {} local last_attack = 0 local state = 0 -- state: 0 means "ready to start", 1 means "adding more daggers", 2 means "throw daggers" local switchEvenOddParity = -1
function burn(humanoid) if humanoid then local character = humanoid.Parent local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if torso and humanoid and torso:FindFirstChild("GhostFire") == nil then local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 102/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255, 1, 1) fire.Name = "GhostFire" fire.Parent = torso
local duration = 5 while duration > 0 do if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(4) end duration = duration - 1 wait(1) end
if fire then fire:Destroy() end end end end
function blow(dagger, hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or dagger == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Accessory") then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then if hitSound then hitSound:Play() end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() burn(humanoid) end)) end if connection then connection:disconnect() end if hit.Name ~= "ThrownDagger" then dagger.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) -- have the dagger drop dead upon impact daggerFloat = dagger:FindFirstChild("BodyForce") if daggerFloat ~= nil then daggerFloat:Destroy() end end end
function shoot(dPos, missile)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil then return end local vHum = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if vHum == nil then return end local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos * 5.0
missile.Weld:Destroy() missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + dPos) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi/2)
missile.Velocity = dPos * 70 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) missile.Name = "ThrownDagger" missile.CanCollide = true
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:getMass()*workspace.Gravity,0) force.Parent = missile
missile.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(missile, hit) end) missile.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(missile, 7) end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
Dagger.Transparency = 1
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RightHand") if rightArm == nil then return end rightShoulder = myTorso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") if not rightShoulder then local RightUpperArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RightUpperArm") if RightUpperArm then rightShoulder = RightUpperArm:FindFirstChild("RightShoulder") end end
local firing = false local t = r.Stepped:wait() local DaggerOffset = myHumanoid and ((myHumanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 and -0.2) or -1.2) if state == 0 then daggers = {} -- start the dagger adding process local newDagger = Tool.Handle:Clone() newDagger.Transparency = 0
local newDaggerWeld = Instance.new("Weld") newDaggerWeld.Part0 = newDagger newDaggerWeld.Part1 = rightArm newDaggerWeld.C1 = (CFrame.new() + Vector3.new(0, DaggerOffset, -0.5)) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) + Vector3.new(0, 0, -0.35) newDaggerWeld.Parent = newDagger
newDagger.Parent = game.Workspace
table.insert(daggers, newDagger) last_attack = t state = 1 clinkSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ClinkSound") if clinkSound ~= nil then clinkSound.Volume = .5 clinkSound:Play() end elseif (t - last_attack < .70) and #daggers < 7 then -- add a dagger
local newDagger = Tool.Handle:Clone() newDagger.Transparency = 0
local newDaggerWeld = Instance.new("Weld") newDaggerWeld.Part0 = newDagger newDaggerWeld.Part1 = rightArm switchEvenOddParity = -switchEvenOddParity angle = math.ceil(#daggers/2)*math.pi/8*switchEvenOddParity newDaggerWeld.C1 = (CFrame.new() + Vector3.new(0, DaggerOffset, -0.5))*CFrame.Angles(0, angle, 0) + Vector3.new(-.75*math.sin(angle), 0, -.75*math.cos(angle)+.4) newDaggerWeld.Parent = newDagger
newDagger.Parent = game.Workspace
table.insert(daggers, newDagger)
clinkSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ClinkSound") if clinkSound ~= nil then clinkSound.Volume = 0.5 clinkSound:Play() end
elseif (t - last_attack > 1.45) then -- throw the daggers local reload = 1.5 local targetPos = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position).unit
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ThrowSound") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = .6 confettiBang:Play() end
if state ~= 0 then firing = true switchEvenOddParity = 1 for i = 1, #daggers do angle = math.ceil((i-1)/2)*math.pi/12*switchEvenOddParity switchEvenOddParity = -switchEvenOddParity shoot(CFrame.Angles(0, angle, 0) * lookAt, daggers[i]) daggers[i] = nil
rightShoulder.MaxVelocity = 0.5 rightShoulder.DesiredAngle = 0 -- 3.14 end firing = false end
wait(reload) Dagger.Transparency = 0.0 confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ThrowSound") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0 end clinkSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ClinkSound") if clinkSound ~= nil then clinkSound.Volume = 0 end state = 0 end
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() if fireWeld then fireWeld.Parent = Dagger end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") rightShoulder = myTorso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") if not rightShoulder then local RightUpperArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RightUpperArm") if RightUpperArm then rightShoulder = RightUpperArm:FindFirstChild("RightShoulder") end end rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RightHand") end
function onUnequipped() Dagger.Transparency = 0.0 state = 0 if not firing then for i = 1, #daggers do if daggers[i] ~= nil then daggers[i]:Destroy() end end daggers = {} end if fire then fire.Enabled = true end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Dagger.Touched:connect(function() blow(Dagger, hit) end)

local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
